trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_SEQ_00<tab>The Ishgardian glassworker needs to touch glass.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the Ishgardian glassworker.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_TODO_01<tab>Gather fetching fragments.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the fetching fragments to the Ishgardian glassworker.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the Ishgardian glassworker.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_001<tab>Ah, an adventurer! A proper adventurer, that is. Out here, we are all adventurers of a sort, are we not?
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_002<tab>In sooth, however, I am a glassworker of Ishgard.

TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_003<tab>'Twas for that expertise that I was invited to take part in the initiative, and I have been quite content to oversee the work at Glassblowers' Beacon.

TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_004<tab>Yet as my time here draws to a close, I find myself regretting having failed to venture further afield. I am certain its vistas would inspire me for years to come.

TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_005<tab>For that reason, I should like to take a brief stroll─and perhaps collect a few samples that might be incorporated into my future works. Provided you are willing to escort me through the harrowing environs, of course.

TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_006<tab>Then I am in your debt. Once you have made your expert preparations for the trials ahead, let us meet to the southwest─within a safe distance of the grotto, of course.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_010<tab>Breathtaking...
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_011<tab>Oh, forgive me. I was captivated by the scenery.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_012<tab>I had thought to venture further, but perhaps the inspiration I seek can be gathered right here on our doorstep...
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_013<tab>As an associate of the initiative, you must be a capable artisan in your own right. Why not share in this artistic exercise with me?

TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_014<tab>Bring me whatever fetching fragments speak to your aesthetic sense. I shall limit my search to these surrounds, lest I inadvertently endanger myself.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_020<tab>May we both find some truly fabulous frit!
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_030<tab>You're alive! Did you espy any works of art?
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_031<tab>You have an artisan's eye, indeed. 'Twould be an honor to work with any one of these.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_032<tab>You may count me thoroughly dazzled by the sights and samples both.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_033<tab>...But what of you? You have spent far more time wandering the star than I.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_034<tab>How have you found your time on Phaenna?
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_A1_000_001<tab>I've encountered wonders I never could have imagined!
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_A1_000_002<tab>'Tis exploration itself I enjoy. For that, Phaenna is beautiful indeed.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_A1_000_003<tab>Eh, I've seen worse.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_036<tab>Spoken like an adventurer true.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_037<tab>I confess that as beautiful as I find the sea of stars, it frightens me in equal measure.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_038<tab>How much there is to see...and how limited my own view of it. The moment I stepped outside the grotto, I was nigh overcome.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_039<tab>I am glad to have glimpsed this star through your eyes, if only for a short while. Come, let us return to the Beacon.

TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_050<tab>You have my deepest gratitude, adventurer. I shall never forget the beauty of this <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((evening)) ((day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((day)) ((evening)) /var>)) /var>.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_051<tab>And to think that I may have turned down the initiative's invitation were it not for my present struggle at the atelier...
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_052<tab>Not long ago, you see, Lord Aymeric himself commissioned a work of stained glass to celebrate the newfound harmony between man and dragon.

TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_053<tab>From the first, I floundered. Long did I know dragons only as terrifying beasts. To see beauty, let alone kinship, in the visage of those creatures? 'Twas beyond even my imagination.

TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_054<tab>Now, however, I begin to understand. Even the most fearsome wyrm is but a single soul like you or I, facing the endless expanse with fear...and with wonder.
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_055<tab>I envision a dragon soaring between stars, graceful and strong. Following a glimmer of light across an unimaginable distance...
TEXT_KINGWZ202_05412_GLASSCRAFTMAN05412_000_056<tab>A fitting use for this glass, I should think.
